mapper.update: update t_staff_info set nickname=#{nickname},birthday=#{birthday},gender=#{gender}, address=#{address},tel=#{tel}, photo=#{photo}, status=#{status} where u_id=#{uid}
mapper.select: select u.id,u.username,u.phone,u.phone,u.email,u.idcard,s.u_id,s.photo,s.nickname,s.birthday,s.gender,s.address,s.status,c.name from (t_user u left join t_staff_info s on u.id=s.u_id) left join t_community c on s.u_id=u.community_id where s.u_id=#{uid}
